SEARCH
Package antcolonyoptimization

Class Ant

java.lang.Object
antcolonyoptimization.Ant
public class Ant extends Object
This class is a single ant in the colony Contains method such as create colony, move to city, perform a cycle, update pheromones and decide which city to go next
